<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Magical Scholastics](/Feats.aspx?ID=1884) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 156 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Archaeologist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=46)

**Prerequisites**
[Archaeologist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1879); [Magical Scholastics](/Feats.aspx?ID=1880)

</column>

---

You broaden your magical studies, allowing you to find the right path, detect objects, and conceal those objects from unscrupulous rivals. You can cast [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15), [_locate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=173), and [_nondetection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=209) as occult innate spells, each once per day. You can cast this _nondetection_ spell only on an object, and it is automatically heightened to the same spell level as your cantrips from [Magical Scholastics](/Feats.aspx?ID=1880).
name: Greater Magical Scholastics
